sentences.en: An epidemic of several silkworm diseases caused production to fall, especially in France, where the industry never recovered.
sentences.cn: 而几种桑蚕疾病的流行导致了丝绸产品下滑，特别在法国，丝绸工业再也没有恢复。

sentences.en: During Neolithic Period, people have already begun breeding silkworm and producing silk.
sentences.cn: 新石器时代, 蚕的养殖和丝绸的生产,就已经开始了.

sentences.en: Infectious flacherie virus ( IFV ) is the agent causing flacherie disease of silkworm.
sentences.cn: 病毒性软化病是一种严重影响蚕业生产的流行病,其病原为家蚕传染性软化病病毒 ( Bombyxmoriinfectiousflacherie virus,BmIFV ).

sentences.en: North American silkworm moth; larvae feed on the leaves of forest trees.
sentences.cn: 北美洲的蚕蛾; 幼虫吃森林的树叶.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the mechanism of hypoglycemic action of silkworm cocoon.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨蚕茧降血糖作用的机理.

sentences.en: Peculiarities in the silkworm are known to appear at the corresponding caterpillar or cocoon stage.
sentences.cn: 蚕体的性状,亦限于相当的幼虫期或蛹期出现.

sentences.en: Purpose To extract and to analyze the oil ingredients Silkworm pupa.
sentences.cn: 目的提取蚕蛹油,测定主要成分的含量.

sentences.en: Scope of business: Fresh bamboo, smoked bamboo, silkworm cocoon, cowhide, bristles, etc.
sentences.cn: 经营范围: 清水笋 、 熏笋 、 蚕茧 、 牛皮 、 猪鬃等.

sentences.en: Silkworm chrysalis is the important raw material of silk industry.
sentences.cn: 桑蚕茧是丝绸工业的重要原料.

sentences.en: Silkworm culture is practised in order to get silk.
Silkworm mulberry was built to publicize leadership group on the village.
sentences.cn: 村上建立了蚕桑宣传领导小组.

sentences.en: The first silkworm diseases began to appear in 1845, creating an epidemic.
sentences.cn: 1845年，首批桑蚕疾病开始出现，并引起了一次流行。

sentences.en: The fish are fed on the silkworm droppings and cane leaves.
The Silkworm Goddess had been beneficent to the tiny village this year.
sentences.cn: 今年蚕花娘娘保佑这小小的村子.

sentences.en: The temperature in the silkworm room is too high.
sentences.cn: 这间蚕房的温度太高了.

sentences.en: The unspoken mobilization order for the silkworm campaign reached everywhere and everyone.
sentences.cn: 蚕事的动员令也在各方面发动了.

sentences.en: When Aqiao returned home, she found that the silkworm eggs had hatched.
sentences.cn: 当阿巧回到家时, 她发现蚕卵已经孵出来了.

trans.tran_en: a type of  caterpillar  which produces silk thread
